title: Automated loop development of aura-cli using the aura loop system and brain
loop and workflow integration into main.py

subtasks.title: Step 1: Analyze the current structure of main.py to identify existing loop and workflow integration points.
Step 2: Compare the current integration with industry best practices to find structural gaps.
Step 3: Propose upgrades to the loop and workflow capabilities, including asynchronous processing and enhanced error handling.
Step 4: Design a step-by-step implementation plan for integrating loops and workflows into main.py.
Step 5: Create a set of unit tests to validate the functionality of the new integration.
Step 6: Predict potential failure modes, such as deadlocks or race conditions, that could arise from the new structure.
Step 7: Develop contingencies for predicted failure modes, including fallback mechanisms and logging frameworks.
Step 8: Suggest architectural improvements, like modular design principles or the use of design patterns, to enhance future scalability and maintainability.
Step 9: Document the integration process and ensure knowledge sharing among relevant system components.
Step 10: Review and iterate on feedback from the implementation to refine the integration further.

title: automated goal handling and updating for autonomous development
automated goal handling and updating for autonomous development --decompose
automated goal handling and updating for autonomous development
Add rollback/transaction support to ApplicatorAgent so multiple file changes in a cycle succeed or fail atomically, preventing half-applied mutations.
Add rollback/transaction support to ApplicatorAgent so multiple file changes in a cycle succeed or fail atomically, preventing half-applied mutations that leave the codebase in an inconsistent state.
When SandboxAgent execution fails, have CoderAgent automatically re-generate code with sandbox stderr as feedback context, retrying up to 3 times before escalating to verification failure.

Use VectorStore semantic search to intelligently compress Brain memory dumps that exceed the model token budget, retaining the most-relevant entries to prevent token overflow errors in the planning phase.

Extend architecture_validator skill to build a directed import graph from the project and detect circular imports using strongly connected components, flagging them with file paths and remediation suggestions.

Add per-skill call metrics (success rate, average latency, signal rate) stored in memory/strategy_stats.json and exposed via the /metrics endpoint in aura_cli/server.py; feed results into skill_weight_adapter for data-driven skill selection.
